Title: Object: Le repos de la Sainte Famille
Series: Le Musée Français
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Cantarini, with the Virgin sitting in the left foreground, cradling Christ Child, and St Joseph sleeping in the background, to right. 1795/97 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Benoît Louis Henriquez
Curator's comments: Part of 'Le Musée Français', published from 1803 to 1809 (see 1875,0410.469 for comment); two previous states, respectively dated 'an 4eme' (1795/96) and 'an 5eme' (1796/97), are described in the IFF catalogue. Engraved after a painting which is now in the Louvre (inv. 176)
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (110.III)
